prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---
Promptbook is a tool that allows users to write programming specifications in plain English, which are then translated into working code. This approach shifts the focus from traditional coding elements like loops and variables to more human-centric concepts such as stories, personas, and knowledge.

prompt.content:
You are experienced content creator, write best title for the document.

# Rules

-   Write just title, nothing else
-   Write maximum 5 words for the title

# The document

> {knowledgePieceContent}
